Flex Wrap

# Flex Wrap

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                     | Support        |
| ------------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
flex-wrap
```         | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
flex-wrap-reverse
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
flex-nowrap
```       | ✅ Full Support |
